T02D1251:220b-17: kye yi rdo rje deng 'grub mdzod //

T02D1251:220b-20: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //

T02D1251:220b-22: nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa'ang khyod //

T02D1251:220b-27: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D1251:220b-28: byang chub sems dpas bdag grub mdzod //
T02D1251:220b-29: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po rgyal mchog gis //
T02D1251:220b-30: grub pa'i rdo rje cher ston pa //
T02D1251:220b-31: rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag mdzod cig / sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing //
T02D1251:220b-32: sems can kun gyi yid la zhugs //
T02D1251:220b-33: sems can kun gyi yab gyur nyid //
T02D1251:220b-34: 'dod chags dam tshig mchog gyur pa'o //
T02D1251:220b-35: bden pa dag gis ye shes mchog //
T02D1251:220b-36: shes rab thabs dag dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1251:220b-37: bden pa de yis mgon bdag la //
T02D1251:220b-38: khyed kyis 'dod pa rab rdzogs mdzod //
T02D1251:220b-39: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //

T02D1251:220b-41: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D1251:220b-42: rgyu dang las la kun du 'byung //

T02D1251:220b-45: gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma ni //
T02D1251:220b-46: kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog /
T02D1251:220b-47: de ltar bstod cing phyag bgyis nas //
T02D1251:221a-3: slob ma rab tu gzhug par bgyi //

T02D1251:221a-5: bzod pa mdzad de dgongs su gsol //

T02D1251:221a-7: zhabs la gtugs la 'di skad brjod //
T02D1251:221a-8: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02D1251:221a-9: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D1251:221a-10: byang chub chen po'i tshul brtan pa //
T02D1251:221a-11: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //

T02D1251:221a-19: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song //
T02D1251:221a-20: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la'o //
T02D1251:221a-21: 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i //
T02D1251:221a-22: dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o //
T02D1251:221a-23: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //

T02D1251:221a-54: brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o //
T02D1251:221b-0: phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba @221b yi //

T02D1251:221b-5: rnal 'byor pa kun bsnyen bkur bya //

T02D1251:221b-26: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung //

T02D1251:221b-44: byang chub sems ni bla na med //

T02D1251:221b-50: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //

T02D1251:222a-27: de nas slob mas gos dmar pos //

T02D1251:222a-30: bsrung zhing sku gsung thugs sbyangs la //

T02D1251:229b-13: rim bzhin du // lhan cig skyes pa'i nyi zlar gyur //
T02D1251:229b-14: 'od zer bye ba brgya stong nas //
T02D1251:229b-15: ma lus bzhugs pas byin gyis rlob //
T02D1251:229b-16: de nas bla nyi nyi rang la //
T02D1251:229b-17: zer yang spu rtsa de 'bum cha //
T02D1251:229b-18: 'bum cha'ang mi dmigs tshul de nyid //
T02D1251:229b-19: dga' ba chen po bsgom par bya //
T02D1251:229b-20: rdor dril yid 'ong mtshan ldan pa //
T02D1251:229b-21: g-yas kyis gsor zhing g-yon gyis dkrol //
T02D1251:229b-22: bcu drug cha la yang dag rdzogs //
T02D1251:229b-23: thams cad thams cad bdag nyid la //
T02D1251:229b-24: chu bo rgyun du 'bab pa dang //
T02D1251:229b-25: mar me rgyun du 'bar ba ltar //
T02D1251:229b-26: rtag tu de nyid rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1251:229b-27: nyin dang mtshan du gnas par bya //
T02D1251:229b-29: der ni sa ni skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1251:229b-30: gsher ba'i rnam pa byang chub sems //
T02D1251:229b-32: bsrubs pas me ni skye ba ste //
T02D1251:229b-33: 'gro ba rlung du rab tu grags //
T02D1251:229b-34: bde ba nam mkha' yi ni khams //
T02D1251:229b-35: gang phyir 'byung chen bde ba yis //
T02D1251:229b-36: lnga rnams yongs su bskor ba ste //
T02D1251:229b-37: de phyir bde ba de nyid min //
T02D1251:229b-38: lha gcig skyes gnyis gang skyes pa //
T02D1251:229b-39: de ni lhan skyes zhes su brjod //
T02D1251:229b-40: rang bzhin lhan cig skyes zhes bya //
T02D1251:229b-41: rnam pa thams cad sdom pa gcig / thugs rje thabs yin rnal 'byor pa'i //
T02D1251:229b-42: phyag rgya rgyu dang bral ba nyid //
T02D1251:229b-43: snying rje stong pa tha dad med //
T02D1251:229b-44: 'di ni byang chub sems zhes brjod //
T02D1251:229b-45: sngags 'dzab dka' thub sbyin sreg byed //
T02D1251:229b-47: sngags bzlas dka' thub sbyin sreg de //
T02D1251:229b-49: mdo ru bsdus na sems nyid de //
T02D1251:230a-2: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ni //
T02D1251:230a-3: nye bar thob par gyur pa'i rtags //
T02D1251:230a-4: dang po sprin gyi rnam pa ste //
T02D1251:230a-5: gnyis pa du ba 'dra ba nyid //
T02D1251:230a-6: gsum pa me khyer rnam pa dang //
T02D1251:230a-7: bzhi pa mar me nye 'bar ba //
T02D1251:230a-8: lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ste //
T02D1251:230a-9: sprin med nam mkha' 'dra ba nyid //
T02D1251:230a-10: phyi nas sgyu ma'i rnam pa ltar //
T02D1251:230a-11: rmi lam rnam par skad cig 'gyur //
T02D1251:230a-12: khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba //
T02D1251:230a-13: ma lus lus pa med par 'grub //
T02D1251:230a-14: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las /
T02D1251:230a-15: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i bya ba ste bdun pa'o /
T02D1251:230a-17: // / mkhas pa sngags kyi mthar phyin cing //
T02D1251:230a-18: bstan bcos kun la 'jigs med pas //
T02D1251:230a-20: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga bya //
T02D1251:230a-21: lus bkrus dris bsgom gos gtsang bgos //
T02D1251:230a-22: do shal rkang gdub dpung rgyan dang //
T02D1251:230a-23: rna cha gdu bu sor gdub sogs //
T02D1251:230a-24: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan byas te //
T02D1251:230a-25: zla ba dag dang tshes grangs dang //
T02D1251:230a-26: gza' dang skar ma bzang po la //
T02D1251:230a-28: skyon spangs rnam mdzes bla gab can //
T02D1251:230a-29: ba yi rnam lnga dri zhim byugs //
T02D1251:230a-30: me tog sil ma sna tshogs dgram //
T02D1251:230a-31: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan la sogs //
T02D1251:230a-32: bla re mchog ni bre bya zhing //
T02D1251:230a-33: bkra shis rnams kyis brgyan pa yi //
T02D1251:230a-34: bum pa rin chen sogs gang dang //
T02D1251:230a-35: pi wang gling bu 'khar rnga sogs //
T02D1251:230a-36: glu gar dga' ston cher bya'i phyir //
T02D1251:230a-37: ci 'byor mchod pa legs bshams nas //
T02D1251:230a-38: gong ma'i cho gas bsrung bar bya //
T02D1251:230a-39: de nas gtor ma legs byin nas //
T02D1251:230a-40: sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma gang //
T02D1251:230a-41: sku gzugs glegs bam mchod rten sogs //
T02D1251:230a-42: dang po nyes pa bkru ba'i phyir //
T02D1251:230a-43: ba yi lci ba chu dang zho //
T02D1251:230a-45: 'bru mar gyis kyang byug par bya //
T02D1251:230a-46: 'bru mar shun lpags lngas bsal bya'o //
T02D1251:230a-47: au dum b'a ra shi ri sha //
T02D1251:230a-48: aa shva ttha dang n+ya gro dha //
T02D1251:230a-49: bar ka ta yi shun pags te //
T02D1251:230a-50: de nas dri lngas khrus gsol ba //
T02D1251:230a-51: tsandan gnyis dang gur gum dang //
T02D1251:230a-52: la gu dran ti ka lnga'o //
T02D1251:230a-53: phyi dro sku gzugs 'du byas pa //
T02D1251:230b-1: lhag par gnas bya bum pa yang //
T02D1251:230b-2: snga ma'i cho ga bzhin du'o //
T02D1251:230b-3: lha gnas phyogs char khrus sa ni //
T02D1251:230b-4: zur bzhi khru bzhi khru do dpangs //
T02D1251:230b-5: yid 'ong mdzes bcas gdan steng bzhugs //
T02D1251:230b-6: bkra shis rol mor bcas khyus gsol //
T02D1251:230b-7: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02D1251:230b-8: lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ba //
T02D1251:230b-9: lha yi chu ni dag pa de //
T02D1251:230b-10: de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo //
T02D1251:230b-11: khyod ni sbyin pa'i rang bzhin chus //
T02D1251:230b-12: ser sna'i dri ma sbyong mdzad cing //
T02D1251:230b-13: gtong ba dri yis rjes bsgos pa //
T02D1251:230b-15: khyod ni tshul khrims rang bzhin chus //
T02D1251:230b-16: khrims 'chal dri ma sbyong mdzad cing //
T02D1251:230b-17: tshul khrims dri yis legs bsgos pa //
T02D1251:230b-19: khyod ni bzod pa'i rang bzhin chus //
T02D1251:230b-20: zhe sdang dri ma spyod mdzad cing //
T02D1251:230b-21: byams pa'i dri yis legs bsgos pa //
T02D1251:230b-23: khyod ni brtson 'grus rang bzhin chus //
T02D1251:230b-24: le lo'i dri ma sbyong mdzad cing //
T02D1251:230b-25: brtson 'grus dri yis legs bsgos pa //
T02D1251:230b-27: khyod ni bsam gtan rang bzhin chus //
T02D1251:230b-28: rnam g-yeng dri ma sbyong mdzad cing//
T02D1251:230b-29: ting 'dzin dri yis legs bsgos pa //
T02D1251:230b-31: khyod ni shes rab rang bzhin chus //
T02D1251:230b-32: shes 'chal dri ma sbyong mdzad cing //
T02D1251:230b-33: ye shes dri yis legs bsgos la //
T02D1251:230b-35: chu bo drug gis khrus mdzad cing //
T02D1251:230b-36: dri ma rnam drug sbyong mdzad pa //
T02D1251:230b-37: rgya chen yon tan drug ldan pa //
T02D1251:230b-38: khrus legs mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1251:230b-39: gang la nyes pa mi mnga' zhing //
T02D1251:230b-40: yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa //
T02D1251:230b-41: sangs rgyas de la thar don du //
T02D1251:230b-42: dad pas bdag ni khrus gsol lo //
T02D1251:230b-43: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya bi shodha ne sv'a h'a //
T02D1251:230b-45: aom h'u% tr'am hr'i: mar khu'o //
T02D1251:230b-46: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka
T02D1251:230b-47: te sa ma ya shr'i ye a'a: h'u% sv'a h'a
T02D1251:230b-48: // sku khrus gsol ba'i sngags so //
T02D1251:230b-49: de nas mkhas pas bkra shis kyi //
T02D1251:230b-50: tshigs bcad 'di yang brjod par bya //
T02D1251:230b-51: nyin mo bkra shis mtshan bkra shis //
T02D1251:231a-2: nyin mtshan rtag tu bkra shis pa //
T02D1251:231a-3: sangs rgyas rnams kyis deng 'dir stsol //
T02D1251:231a-4: nyin mo bkra shis mtshan bkra shis //
T02D1251:231a-5: nyi ma'i gung la gnas bkra shis //
T02D1251:231a-6: nyin mtshan rtag tu bkra shis pa //
T02D1251:231a-7: dam chos rnams kyis ding 'dir stsol //
T02D1251:231a-10: rgyal sras rnams kyis deng 'dir stsol //
T02D1251:231a-11: phyogs skyong rnams kyis deng 'dir stsol //
T02D1251:231a-12: srung ma'i tshogs kyis deng 'dir stsol //
T02D1251:231a-13: de ltar khrus gsol de 'og tu //
T02D1251:231a-14: gos kyi phyi bzhin dri lngas byug / sku la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni //
T02D1251:231a-15: bdud rtsi 'khyil bas bsrung bar bya //
T02D1251:231a-16: de nas sku sogs mi dmigs la //
T02D1251:231a-17: rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya ste //
T02D1251:231a-18: de la sku sogs rdzogs pa la //
T02D1251:231a-19: spyan drangs mchod pa la sogs bya //
T02D1251:231a-20: ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad dag / dga' ldan du ni gnas nas su //
T02D1251:231a-21: lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums gshegs pa //
T02D1251:231a-22: de bzhin 'dir ni gshegs su gsol //
T02D1251:231a-23: aom badzra goo r'i a'a karsha ya dza: aom badzro tsoo r'i pra be sha ya h'um /
T02D1251:231a-24: aom badzra be t'a l'i bandha bam /
T02D1251:231a-25: aom badzra gha sma r'i wa sham ku ru ho: /'dir ni rtag tu bzhugs nas kyang //
T02D1251:231a-26: brtse bas rjes su gzung ba dang //
T02D1251:231a-27: byang chub sems ni rab 'phel phyir //
T02D1251:231a-28: brtan par 'dir ni bzhugs su gsol //
T02D1251:231a-29: aom badzra dha ra dha ra /
T02D1251:231a-30: dha ra ya dha ra ya /
T02D1251:231a-32: badzra dhri ga aa dham ti shtha /
T02D1251:231a-33: aom sa shva pa ra ma sa shva ta /
T02D1251:231a-34: ae hye hi dzi na dzi ka aa dhi ti shtha /
T02D1251:231a-35: aom badzra s'u rya ta mo bi dha ma na
T02D1251:231a-36: sa ma ya stvam ham ratna dhi ka aa dhi
T02D1251:231a-37: ti shtha / aom badzra dharm'a sa ma ya stvam
T02D1251:231a-38: hu lu hu lu a'a ro li ka aa dhi
T02D1251:231a-39: ti shtha / ti shtha / phu: phu: phu: hi hi hi /
T02D1251:231a-40: pra dzny'a dhi ka aa dhi ti shtha /
T02D1251:231a-41: aom mo ha ra ti aa dhi ti shtha /
T02D1251:231a-42: aom dve sha ra ti aa dhi ti shtha /
T02D1251:231a-43: aom r'a ga ra ti aa dhi ti shtha /
T02D1251:231a-44: aom badzra ra ti aa dhi ti shtha /
T02D1251:231a-45: de nas mig sogs gti mug sogs //
T02D1251:231a-46: rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod //
T02D1251:231a-47: dbang ni rang gi rigs nyid kyis //
T02D1251:231a-48: rang nyid gnas su ye shes bsam //
T02D1251:231a-49: ye shes bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1251:231a-50: mchod pa'i rim pa dbul bar bya //
T02D1251:231a-52: rgya cher rab tu mchod nas ni //
T02D1251:231a-53: blo dang ldan pas bstod pa bya //
T02D1251:231a-54: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che//
T02D1251:231b-0: @231b rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' chen po //
T02D1251:231b-1: rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum //
T02D1251:231b-2: rdo rje dbyings la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1251:231b-3: rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che //
T02D1251:231b-4: rdo rje zhi ba dga' chen po //
T02D1251:231b-5: rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog / ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1251:231b-6: rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab //
T02D1251:231b-7: rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med //
T02D1251:231b-8: rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med //
T02D1251:231b-9: rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1251:231b-10: rdo rje mi 'chi rgyal po che //
T02D1251:231b-11: mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1251:231b-12: 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes //
T02D1251:231b-13: rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1251:231b-14: don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1251:231b-15: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa //
T02D1251:231b-16: rang bzhin dag pa nyid las byung //
T02D1251:231b-17: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1251:231b-18: der ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang //
T02D1251:231b-19: sbyin sreg gtor ma'ang rgyas par bya //
T02D1251:231b-20: mthong dang ma mthong 'bras bu dag / phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur //
T02D1251:231b-21: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las rab tu gnas pa'i bya ba ste brgyad pa'o /
T02D1251:231b-23: // / blo ldan khrus byas rgyan rnams brgyan //
T02D1251:231b-24: dkyil 'khor bsgrub dus gnas nang du //
T02D1251:231b-25: sbyin sreg de nyid la gnas te //
T02D1251:231b-26: las kun sgrub byed sbyin sreg bya //
T02D1251:231b-27: sngags pas byang du mngon bltas te //
T02D1251:231b-28: zhi ba'i las ni yang dag brtsam //
T02D1251:231b-29: shar du rgyas pa mngon spyod lhor //
T02D1251:231b-30: dbang dang dgug pa nub tu'o //
T02D1251:231b-31: zhi ba dgongs ka bya ba ste //
T02D1251:231b-32: rgyas pa nang par bya ba yin //
T02D1251:231b-33: dbang dang dgug pa nyi phyed la //
T02D1251:231b-34: mtshan phyed gsad dang zhe sdang ngo //
T02D1251:231b-35: phan pa gnyis kyis zhi ba ste //
T02D1251:231b-36: rdo rje nyi ma rgyas pa'o //
T02D1251:231b-37: rdo rje chos kyi dbang zhes bya //
T02D1251:231b-38: rdo rje sems dpa' gsad pa'o //
T02D1251:231b-39: zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba ste //
T02D1251:231b-40: nad la sogs pa zhi bar bya //
T02D1251:231b-41: rgyas pa'i sems kyis rgyas pa ste //
T02D1251:231b-42: rin chen char sprin rab bskor bya //
T02D1251:231b-43: rjes su chags pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D1251:231b-44: dgug pa'i las ni yang dag brtsam //
T02D1251:231b-45: gdug pa'i sems kyis gsad pa ste //
T02D1251:231b-46: me yi char sprin dbab par bya //
T02D1251:231b-47: zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po ste //
T02D1251:231b-48: rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi'o //
T02D1251:231b-49: dbang ni zla ba phyed pa 'dra //
T02D1251:231b-50: dgug pa la ni lcags kyu'i dbyibs //
T02D1251:231b-51: gsad dang zhe sdang las la ni //
T02D1251:232a-2: khru gang pa dang khru phyed par //
T02D1251:232a-3: rgya dang zabs ni zhi ba ste //
T02D1251:232a-4: khru do pa dang khru gang pa //
T02D1251:232a-5: rgya dang zabs ni rgyas pa yin //
T02D1251:232a-6: dbang dang dgug pa'ang khru gang pa //
T02D1251:232a-7: khru phyed rgya dang zabs su bstan //
T02D1251:232a-8: sor mo nyi shu de yi phyed //
T02D1251:232a-9: rgya zabs gsad dang zhe sdang la'o //
T02D1251:232a-10: zhi ba'i kha khyer sor bzhi ste //
T02D1251:232a-11: rgyas pa la ni sor mo brgyad //
T02D1251:232a-12: dbang dang dgug la sor bzhi bzhi //
T02D1251:232a-13: gsad dang sdang la sor gsum gsum //
T02D1251:232a-14: phyed ma dkar pos zhi ba la //
T02D1251:232a-15: de bzhin rgyas pa ser po ste //
T02D1251:232a-16: dbang dang dgug la dmar por grags //
T02D1251:232a-17: gsod dang zhe sdang nag po'o //
T02D1251:232a-19: ral gri rdo rje ci rigs dgod //
T02D1251:232a-21: las kun pa yi sbyin sreg ste //
T02D1251:232a-22: tshad dang dbyibs dang kha dog dag / zhi ba dang mthun shar blta'o //
T02D1251:232a-23: dgang gzar dbye ba bshad par bya //
T02D1251:232a-24: gser sogs nim pa mchod sbyin zhing //
T02D1251:232a-25: yu ba khru do mchu sor brgyad //
T02D1251:232a-26: zheng zabs rdo rje sor bzhi'o //
T02D1251:232a-27: kha ni padma'i rnam pa mtshungs //
T02D1251:232a-28: ska rags gru bzhi mdzes pa ste //
T02D1251:232a-30: rin chen sor gnyis yu ba'i mgor //
T02D1251:232a-31: tha mar rdo rje sor drug pa //
T02D1251:232a-32: de ni dgang gzar mtshan nyid do //
T02D1251:232a-33: blugs gzar yu ba khru gang ste //
T02D1251:232a-34: mchur ni sor drug zheng dang zabs //
T02D1251:232a-35: rdo rje sor gsum pad 'dab mtshungs //
T02D1251:232a-36: rin chen sor gcig gsum rdo rje //
T02D1251:232a-37: gzhan yang dgang gzar blugs gzar gyi //
T02D1251:232a-38: yu ba khru gang bya ba ste //
T02D1251:232a-39: 'og tu rdo rje rin chen bya //
T02D1251:232a-40: de yi dgang gzar rgyar sor bzhi //
T02D1251:232a-41: zabs su sor bzhi nang rdo rje //
T02D1251:232a-42: sor bzhi'i mthar ni rdo rje ste //
T02D1251:232a-44: blugs gzar pad dbyibs sor gnyis te //
T02D1251:232a-45: zabs su sor gcig nang rdo rje //
T02D1251:232a-46: dgang gzar blugs gzar kha rang gi //
T02D1251:232a-47: lha yi sa bon rab 'bar bsam //
T02D1251:232a-48: ri pha'ang de yi khar dgod bya //
T02D1251:232a-49: yang na sor mo lnga dang gsum //
T02D1251:232a-50: bcer bas kyang ni bya bar gsungs //
T02D1251:232a-51: me tog bdug spos mar me dang //
T02D1251:232a-52: de bzhin dri yi dung sogs g-yas //
T02D1251:232a-53: g-yon du sngags kyi mchod yon snod //
T02D1251:232a-54: mdun du snod ni gzhag par bya //
T02D1251:232b-0: @232b mchod sbyin shing sogs yal ga las //
T02D1251:232b-1: rtse mo mchog ni ma nyams pa //
T02D1251:232b-2: bzang po lo ma gnyis ldan pa //
T02D1251:232b-3: las kyi dbye bas dbye bar bya //
T02D1251:232b-4: rgyas pa la ni sor bcu bzhi //
T02D1251:232b-5: zhi ba sor ni bcu gnyis pa //
T02D1251:232b-6: dbang la sor bcu sdang ba dang //
T02D1251:232b-7: gsad pa la yang sor mo brgyad //
T02D1251:232b-8: sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga //
T02D1251:232b-10: kha 'dzag skye ma rtse ba ni //
T02D1251:232b-11: 'bras bu rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya //
T02D1251:232b-12: tsam pa aa shva ka dang glu //
T02D1251:232b-13: ka tang pa dang srid sgrub nyid //
T02D1251:232b-14: ji ltar rnyed pa bzlas byas nas //
T02D1251:232b-15: me tog 'dis ni sbyin sreg bya //

T02D1251:235b-23: rigs ni rnam pa lnga zhes bshad //
T02D1251:235b-24: brda yi skad ni 'di dag la //
T02D1251:235b-25: sangs rgyas zhes bya rigs lnga yin //
T02D1251:235b-26: g-yung mo rdo rje'i rigs su bshad //
T02D1251:235b-28: rin chen rigs nyid rang 'tshed ma //
T02D1251:235b-29: skye gnyis de bzhin gshegs mar shes //
T02D1251:235b-30: las kyi rigs nyid rang 'tshed ma //
T02D1251:235b-31: phyag rgya 'di dag dngos grub ster //
T02D1251:235b-32: de yi khu ba rdo rje yin //
T02D1251:235b-33: mchod byas brtul zhugs can gyis btud //
T02D1251:235b-34: rdo rje snying po sems dpa' che //
T02D1251:235b-35: khyod la nga yis bshad pa gang //
T02D1251:235b-36: rmad du byung ba brda yi tshig / de dag thams cad dad pas gzung //
T02D1251:235b-37: kye rdo rje las dbang bskur gang //
T02D1251:235b-38: brda yi skad ni mi smra na //
T02D1251:235b-39: de yi dam tshig nyams par ni //
T02D1251:235b-41: yams dang 'tshe ba rkun ma dang //
T02D1251:235b-42: gdon dang rims dang dug rnams kyang //
T02D1251:235b-43: brda yi skad ni mi smra na //
T02D1251:235b-44: gal te sangs rgyas yin yang 'chi //
T02D1251:235b-45: rang gi dam tshig shes snyed la //
T02D1251:235b-46: gal te tshig 'di mi smra na //
T02D1251:235b-47: de la gnas bzhir skyes pa yis //
T02D1251:235b-48: rnal 'byor ma ni khro bar byed //
T02D1251:235b-49: sgrub dus bkra shis dga' ston dang //
T02D1251:235b-50: dam tshig gso pa'i cho ga sogs //
T02D1251:235b-51: yi dags zla phyed bcu bzhi dang //
T02D1251:235b-52: tshes brgyad kyi ni dus dag la //
T02D1251:235b-53: dur khrod ri yi bya skyibs dang //
T02D1251:235b-54: de bzhin mi ma yin gyi gnas //
T02D1251:235b-55: yang na dben pa 'am rgya mtsho'i mthar //
T02D1251:235b-56: ston mo 'di dag brtsam par bya //
T02D1251:235b-57: der ni rtag tu brtag par bya //
T02D1251:235b-58: dung chen dgu dang ro yi gzugs //
T02D1251:235b-59: yang na stag gi pags pa dang //
T02D1251:236a-2: rang gi lhag pa'i lha dmigs nas //
T02D1251:236a-3: bzang po rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1251:236a-4: thams cad 'byor ba'am dmigs nas ni //
T02D1251:236a-5: bems po'i gnas su sreg blugs bya //
T02D1251:236a-6: shar lho byang dang dag phyogs su //
T02D1251:236a-7: phyogs gnas rnams ni dga' bar bya //
T02D1251:236a-8: phyogs bral rnams su lha mo rnams //
T02D1251:236a-9: dam pa'i tshe yis mchod par bya //
T02D1251:236a-10: lcags kyu lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga //
T02D1251:236a-11: rgyal mtshan mtshon bsnun bdun 'khor dang //
T02D1251:236a-12: rgyal po sh'a li la sogs rdzas //
T02D1251:236a-13: ji bzhin byin brlab rim pa ni //
T02D1251:236a-14: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa yis //
T02D1251:236a-15: mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bcas mchod par bya //
T02D1251:236a-16: der ni ma dang sring mo dang //
T02D1251:236a-17: sring mo'i bu mo sgyug mo ste //
T02D1251:236a-18: de nas rgyas par mchod byas nas //
T02D1251:236a-20: thod pa chen po cha gcig pa //
T02D1251:236a-21: chang ni bzang pos bkang byas te //
T02D1251:236a-22: bla ma la dbul skal ldan ma //
T02D1251:236a-23: phyag btsal nas ni bdag btud bya //
T02D1251:236a-24: padma'i lag pas blang bar bya //
T02D1251:236a-25: lag pa de nyid kyis ni dbul //
T02D1251:236a-26: der ni sgrub pa po yis phyag / yang dang yang du bya ba'o //
T02D1251:236a-27: glu gar dngos grub rgyur gsungs pas //
T02D1251:236a-28: de dag gis kyang mchod par bya //
T02D1251:236a-29: kakko lar gnas po la ste //
T02D1251:236a-30: mu mmu ni kye kakko la //
T02D1251:236a-31: kye khyod kri pi ta brdung ba //
T02D1251:236a-32: snying rje ku co mi byed do //
T02D1251:236a-33: der ni ba la bza' bar bya //
T02D1251:236a-34: bsdams par ma da na btung ngo //
T02D1251:236a-35: kye ka li dza ni gzhug par bya //
T02D1251:236a-36: du du ra ni spang bar bya //
T02D1251:236a-37: tsa au sa ma ka sthu ri //
T02D1251:236a-38: ga bur sihlas byug par bya //
T02D1251:236a-39: sh'a li ma la ti dam nam //
T02D1251:236a-40: der ni rkang pa bza' bar bya //
T02D1251:236a-41: phreng ba khan dang khe ta byed //
T02D1251:236a-42: dag dang ma dag mi blta'o //
T02D1251:236a-43: ni ram su yis yan lag brgyan //
T02D1251:236a-44: der ni shra pa rnam par gzhug / ma la dza ni kun du ru //
T02D1251:236a-45: din dam mam ni der mi spang //
T02D1251:236a-46: he ru ka yi gzugs kyis gar //
T02D1251:236a-47: dran pa ma yengs rnal 'byor bya'o //
T02D1251:236a-48: bsgom par zhen pa'i sems kyis bya //
T02D1251:236a-49: chags dang ldan zhing goms pa'i sems //
T02D1251:236a-50: rdo rje chos dang sangs rgyas te //
T02D1251:236a-51: rnal 'byor ma yis mi mo yi //
T02D1251:236a-52: glu dang gar ni 'di dag ste //
T02D1251:236a-53: mchog tu glu blang gar bya'o //
T02D1251:236a-55: de bzhin bdag kyang bsrung ba ste //
T02D1251:236a-57: 'di nyid sngags kyi bzlas pa ste //
T02D1251:236a-58: gang du dad pas glu blang dang//
T02D1251:236b-0: @236b gang du dad pas gar bya ba //
T02D1251:236b-1: tshogs kyi bdag pos sngon byas te /
T02D1251:236b-2: de la dri ni brtag par bya //
T02D1251:236b-3: dang por sgog pa la sogs dri //
T02D1251:236b-4: de nas yang ni bya rgod dri //
T02D1251:236b-5: de rjes ga pur ma la dza //
T02D1251:236b-6: glu yis byin rlabs mtshan nyid do //
T02D1251:236b-7: ngang pa'i skad dang bung pa'i skad //
T02D1251:236b-8: glu yis rjes su thos 'gyur te //
T02D1251:236b-9: ce spyang gi ni skad dag dang //
T02D1251:236b-10: phyi rol tshal du brtag par bya //
T02D1251:236b-11: sgrub pa po dang rnal 'byor mas //
T02D1251:236b-12: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i ston mo ni //
T02D1251:236b-13: gang du zos na dngos grub ni //
T02D1251:236b-15: de ltar glu gar bkra shis dang //
T02D1251:236b-16: smon lam cho ga kun rdzogs nas //
T02D1251:236b-17: yan lag rgyan rnams kyis brgyan te //
T02D1251:236b-18: dro rje dril bu blangs nas ni //
T02D1251:236b-19: bdag nyid rnal 'byor legs ldan pas //
T02D1251:236b-20: phud dang lhag ma kun bsres la //
T02D1251:236b-21: lam gyi bzhi mdor gtor ma gtang //
T02D1251:236b-22: de rjes sbyor ldan bde bar gnas //
T02D1251:236b-23: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las //
T02D1251:236b-24: tshogs kyi mchod pa'i bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o /
T02D1251:236b-26: // / mkhas pas gnas dang dus kun du //
T02D1251:236b-27: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed dang //
T02D1251:236b-28: bgegs ni zad cing zhi bya'i phyir //
T02D1251:236b-29: gtor ma rgyun du sbyin par bya //
T02D1251:236b-30: rlung me thod pa la gnas pa //
T02D1251:236b-31: lcags kyu lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga //
T02D1251:236b-32: 'bar dang skrod pa la sogs bsgrub //
T02D1251:236b-33: de nas phyogs gnas rnams dang ni //

T02D1251:236b-36: g-yon pas dril bu dkrol bya zhing //
T02D1251:236b-37: phyag rgya sgyur pa'i regs pas skrod //
T02D1251:236b-38: lta stangs dang ni dgra bgegs skrod //
T02D1251:236b-39: sngags dang bcas pa'i stang stabs kyis //

T02D1251:236b-43: lag pa g-yas dang g-yon dag gis //
T02D1251:236b-44: rol dang bcas pas mtha' sogs spro //
T02D1251:236b-45: cung zad bskyod pa'i sdigs mig dang //
T02D1251:236b-46: bcas pas smin ma rnam par bskyod //
T02D1251:236b-47: 'gro ba dbang du byed pa'i rgya //
T02D1251:236b-48: g-yas brkyang ba dang g-yon brkyang ba //
T02D1251:236b-49: g-yas bskum pa dang g-yon bskum pa'o //
T02D1251:236b-50: slob dpon gtso bo rdor 'chang gis //

T02D1251:237a-3: bskor stabs seng ge'i mchongs stabs so //
T02D1251:237a-6: g-yas brkyang ba dang g-yon brkyang dang //
T02D1251:237a-7: sa ga zlum po'i stang stabs so //
T02D1251:237a-8: aom h'u% aam aam aam phat /

T02D1251:237a-14: dri yi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa //

T02D1251:237a-26: nyin dang zla ba dngos grub bzhin //

T02D1251:237a-29: gzugs mdzes skar ma 'dus pa dang //
T02D1251:237a-30: gza' tshogs kun dang tshogs kyi gtso //
T02D1251:237a-31: karti ka dang dpal ldan mo //
T02D1251:237a-32: lha mo ri bong can 'dzin ma ;

T02D1251:237a-34: lha min lha yi rgyal po rnams //

T02D1251:237a-41: tshim par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o //

T02D1251:237a-53: 'jog po dang ni stobs kyi rgyu //

T02D1251:237b-17: rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te //

T02D1251:241a-38: bdag gzhan bla med byang chub bsgral ba'i phyir //

T02D1251:241a-42: mkhas pa rnams kyi lam srol rnyil pa nas //
T02D1251:241a-43: shes rab mig dang rigs pa'i rkang pa yis //

T02D1251:241b-3: kye yi rdo rje'i go 'phang myur thob shog //
T02D1251:241b-4: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam rin
T02D1251:241b-5: chen 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so
